name: 2.features
description: First argument will be the Prototype (Boat) _This is only for the prototype (methods) property are define in constructor_ \*We cannot use the prototype to look up a value like property BECAUSE property is created when the instance of that class is created. Decorators is when we "define" the class 2nd argument is the method/property we're applying Decorator to (pilot()) Decorator is ran only 1 time when our class is define (not instance creation)
